
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_53386725">
<i class="pstatus"> 本帖最后由 Ccwtpot 于 2025-7-12 15:47 编辑 </i><br>
<br>
<font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, SF Pro SC, SF Pro Display, SF Pro Icons, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Microsoft YaHei, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Times New Roman, Arial Unicode MS, Luc<a href=" https:="" www.52pojie.cn="" thread-1874203-1-1.html"="" target="_blank" class="relatedlink">IDA Sans Unicode, KaTeX_Main, sans-serif"&gt;<font style="font-size:16px"><font style="color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.88)">论精雕（JDPaint）快速排版的一种方法</font><font color="#800080">（保姆级别</font></font></font><font color="#800080">MT2CSV-V4 + YmxkDoc 组合方案<font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">）</font></font></font><font style="color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.88)"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">-By：Ccwtpot By：時 過境＇遷灬</font></font></font><br>
<font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><strong><font size="6"><font color="#ff0000">精雕（JDPaint）快速排版并输出.nc文件的整合方法流程</font></font></strong></font><br>
<br>
<font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont,"><font color="#ff0000"><strong><font size="3">更新内容：使用图床将丢失的图片添加回来-2025年7月12日13:56:04</font></strong></font></font><br>
<font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont,"><font color="#ff0000"><strong><font size="3"><br>
</font></strong></font></font><br>
<table cellspacing="0" class="t_table" style="width:98%"><tbody><tr style="background-color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"><td><div align="left">步骤</div></td><td><div align="left">工具</div></td><td><div align="left">核心功能</div></td><td><div align="left">关键技术要点</div></td></tr><tr style="background-color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"><td><div align="left">一. CAD内容提取与顺序输出</div></td><td><div align="left">MT2CSV-V4</div></td><td><div align="left">按选择顺序提取文字</div></td><td><div align="left">避免翻找，保障安装顺序</div></td></tr><tr><td><div align="left">二. CorelDRAW快速排版</div></td><td><div align="left">YmxkDoc插件</div></td><td><div align="left">批量数据绑定与自动化生成</div></td><td><div align="left">高效处理门牌、字牌等排版</div></td></tr><tr style="background-color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"><td><div align="left">三. 精雕单线字体转换</div></td><td><div align="left">JDPaint</div></td><td><div align="left">格式转换与字体处理</div></td><td><div align="left">双线字体换成单线字体</div></td></tr><tr><td><div align="left">四. 刀具路径批量生成</div></td><td><div align="left">刀具路径向导</div></td><td><div align="left">深度与刀具参数设置</div></td><td><div align="left">批量处理字、孔和边框</div></td></tr><tr style="background-color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"><td><div align="left">五. NC文件输出与预览</div></td><td><div align="left">输出模块</div></td><td><div align="left">代码兼容性调整</div></td><td><div align="left">按需要的版本输出和本地预览</div></td></tr></tbody></table><font style="color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.88)"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">一、CAD内容提取与顺序输出（MT2CSV-V4）</font></font></font><br>
<font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, SF Pro SC, SF Pro Display, SF Pro Icons, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Microsoft YaHei, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Times New Roman, Arial Unicode MS, Lucida Sans Unicode, KaTeX_Main, sans-serif"><font style="font-size:16px"><font color="#000000">1、插件安装</font></font></font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<img id="aimg_fzBhH" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/Dz2zmzMk/091049p921a0fs25q1mlq5.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/Dz2zmzMk/091049p921a0fs25q1mlq5.png"><br>
<font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, SF Pro SC, SF Pro Display, SF Pro Icons, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Microsoft YaHei, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Times New Roman, Arial Unicode MS, Lucida Sans Unicode, KaTeX_Main, sans-serif"><font style="font-size:16px"><font color="#000000">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;</font><font color="#ff0000">详情请参考以下链接和内容。</font></font></font><font color="#ff0000"><br>
<font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, SF Pro SC, SF Pro Display, SF Pro Icons, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Microsoft YaHei, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Times New Roman, Arial Unicode MS, Lucida Sans Unicode, KaTeX_Main, sans-serif"><font style="font-size:16px">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;下载地址：</font></font><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, SF Pro SC, SF Pro Display, SF Pro Icons, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Microsoft YaHei, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Times New Roman, Arial Unicode MS, Lucida Sans Unicode, KaTeX_Main, sans-serif"><font style="font-size:16px">CAD提取文字和选择排序+XY轴排序，MT2CSV-V4版本</font></font>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;https://www.52pojie.cn/thread-2014292-1-1.html<font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, SF Pro SC, SF Pro Display, SF Pro Icons, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Microsoft YaHei, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Times New Roman, Arial Unicode MS, Lucida Sans Unicode, KaTeX_Main, sans-serif"><font style="font-size:16px">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(出处: 吾爱<a href="https://www.52pojie.cn" target="_blank" class="relatedlink">破解</a>论坛)</font></font><br>
</font><br>
<font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, SF Pro SC, SF Pro Display, SF Pro Icons, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Microsoft YaHei, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Times New Roman, Arial Unicode MS, Lucida Sans Unicode, KaTeX_Main, sans-serif"><font style="font-size:16px"><font color="#000000">&nbsp; &nbsp; 2、使用</font></font></font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<img id="aimg_V8d75" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/9fJQ9j64/103038m5zwt5vi79to49tt.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/9fJQ9j64/103038m5zwt5vi79to49tt.png"><br>
<font color="#ff0000">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;注意：在命令行中输入“<font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">MT2CSV</font></font>”，然后按回车即可选择默认的“选择顺序”输出。</font><br>
<br>
<font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, SF Pro SC, SF Pro Display, SF Pro Icons, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Microsoft YaHei, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Times New Roman, Arial Unicode MS, Lucida Sans Unicode, KaTeX_Main, sans-serif"><font style="font-size:16px"><font color="#000000">&nbsp; &nbsp; 3、</font></font></font><font color="#000"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">数据的转换和输出</font></font></font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<img id="aimg_HvzTe" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/SxbRFdLK/082007rvltylsl5vtzyxh1.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/SxbRFdLK/082007rvltylsl5vtzyxh1.png"><br>
<font color="#ff0000">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;注意：如实际安装是和选择一致的，推荐使用选择顺序输出。</font><br>
<font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont,"><br>
</font>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;4、<font color="#000"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">注意事项</font></font></font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<img id="aimg_CLhH4" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/SxLsy9Vf/091618kemznp60a0e2azp4.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/SxLsy9Vf/091618kemznp60a0e2azp4.png"><br>
<font color="#ff00">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;注意：如第一次安装后重新打开cad，出现这个提示请按始终允许。</font><br>
<font color="#ff0000"><br>
</font><font style="color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.88)"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">二、</font></font></font><font style="color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.88)"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">CorelDRAW快速排版（YmxkDoc插件）</font></font></font><br>
<font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, SF Pro SC, SF Pro Display, SF Pro Icons, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Microsoft YaHei, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Times New Roman, Arial Unicode MS, Lucida Sans Unicode, KaTeX_Main, sans-serif"><font style="font-size:16px">1</font></font><font color="#000"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">、插件安装</font></font></font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<img id="aimg_oS0cT" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/fTNy15fR/Snipaste-2025-07-05-13-56-21.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/fTNy15fR/Snipaste-2025-07-05-13-56-21.png"><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<img id="aimg_mJJPr" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/bw6vDPcZ/Snipaste-2025-07-05-14-05-52.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/bw6vDPcZ/Snipaste-2025-07-05-14-05-52.png"><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br>
<font size="4"><font face="宋体"><font face="宋体"><font color="#000000">&nbsp; &nbsp;</font><font color="#ff0000">解压文件至</font></font><font face="宋体"><font color="#ff0000">CDR安装目录</font></font></font></font><font size="4"><font face="宋体"><font color="#ff0000">&nbsp; &nbsp;</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#ff0000"><font size="4"><font face="宋体">&nbsp; &nbsp;如：</font></font><font face="宋体"><font size="4">D:\cdr2024\CorelDRAW Graphics Suite\25\Programs64\Addons\ymxkDoc</font></font></font><br>
<font size="4"><font color="#ff0000"><font face="宋体">&nbsp; &nbsp;如果最后一个</font><font face="宋体">ymxkDoc</font><font face="宋体">文件夹没有就手动新建一个</font></font></font><br>
<br>
<font color="#000"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">&nbsp; &nbsp; 2、模版的建立和注意事项</font></font></font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<img id="aimg_OoZ6K" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/ncGrx73Y/Snipaste-2025-07-05-14-20-18.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/ncGrx73Y/Snipaste-2025-07-05-14-20-18.png"><img id="aimg_XeHUa" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/ncGrx73Y/Snipaste-2025-07-05-14-20-18.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/ncGrx73Y/Snipaste-2025-07-05-14-20-18.png"><br>
<font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont,"><font style="font-size:16px"><font color="#ff0000">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 注意，请将需要雕刻同样的刀具和深度的，采用同一个颜色。</font></font></font><br>
<font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont,"><font style="font-size:16px"><font color="#ff0000"><br>
</font></font></font><font color="#000"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">&nbsp; &nbsp; 3、数据的绑定与生成</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#000"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; </font></font></font><img id="aimg_hGwp0" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/W4Cb874j/Snipaste-2025-07-07-08-58-41.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/W4Cb874j/Snipaste-2025-07-07-08-58-41.png"><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<img id="aimg_Yc5yD" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/6QypCPtY/Snipaste-2025-07-07-08-59-56.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/6QypCPtY/Snipaste-2025-07-07-08-59-56.png"><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<img id="aimg_I0HHI" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/L4z6kLFK/Snipaste-2025-07-07-09-11-31.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/L4z6kLFK/Snipaste-2025-07-07-09-11-31.png"><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; <br>
<br>
<font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont,"><font style="font-size:16px"><font color="#000000">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;</font><font color="#ff0000">注意，需要<strong>先解除组合才能绑定，绑定后再将模版组合起来再生成</strong>，否则会导致无法生成或者仅生成了文字出来。</font></font></font><br>
<font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont,"><font style="font-size:16px"><font color="#ff0000"><br>
</font></font></font><font color="#000"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">&nbsp; &nbsp; 4、数据的转换和输出</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#000"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></font></font><img id="aimg_Mo3Mo" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/gjqzYFHk/Snipaste-2025-07-07-09-02-50.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/gjqzYFHk/Snipaste-2025-07-07-09-02-50.png"><br>
<font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont,"><font style="font-size:16px"><font color="#000000">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><font color="#ff0000">注意，需要选择DXF的版本为：</font></font></font><font color="#ff0000"><font style="font-size:16px">AutoCAD R11(DWG/DXER11）</font></font><font color="#ff00"><font style="font-size:16px">，导出单位为：毫米，导出文本方式为：文本。</font></font><br>
<font color="#ff00"><font style="font-size:16px"><br>
</font></font><br>
<font color="#000"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">&nbsp; &nbsp; 5、其他注意事项</font></font></font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<img id="aimg_eM5XW" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/fLdWr03d/Snipaste-2025-07-07-09-03-46.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/fLdWr03d/Snipaste-2025-07-07-09-03-46.png"><br>
<font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px"><font color="#000000">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;</font><font color="#ff0000">注意：生成间隙需要根据后面刀具路径的生成提前预留足够的位置，以免因为距离不足导致无法生成路径。</font></font></font><br>
<br>
<font style="color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.88)"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">三、</font></font></font><font style="color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.88)"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">精雕单线字体转换</font></font></font><br>
<font style="color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.88)"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">&nbsp; &nbsp;</font></font></font><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px"><font style="color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.88)"> </font><font color="#000000">1、前置步骤</font></font></font><br>
<font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont,"><font color="#ba0088"><font style="font-size:16px">&nbsp; &nbsp;</font></font></font><img id="aimg_MM9Ne" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/7hyP8Y7W/Snipaste-2025-07-07-09-16-57.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/7hyP8Y7W/Snipaste-2025-07-07-09-16-57.png"><br>
<br>
<font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont,"><font style="font-size:16px"><font color="#000000">&nbsp; &nbsp; </font></font></font><font color="#ff00"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">注意：</font></font></font><font style="font-size:16px"><font color="#ff0000">需要先随便编辑一个文本后将它改为单线字体后，再点选中工具（文字工具下无法进行导入）后进行导入。</font></font><br>
<font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont,"><font style="font-size:16px"><font color="#000000"><br>
</font></font></font><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px"><font style="color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.88)">&nbsp; &nbsp; </font><font color="#000000">2、数据置入</font></font></font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<img id="aimg_iPuuN" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/xT5fhQd6/Snipaste-2025-07-07-09-20-32.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/xT5fhQd6/Snipaste-2025-07-07-09-20-32.png"><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff00"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">注意：单位要和CDR输出的单位一致，例如都是使用mm“毫米”</font></font></font><font style="font-size:16px"><font color="#ff0000">。</font></font><br>
<font color="#ff0000"><font style="font-size:16px">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;如字体数量固定的，可在CDR模版设计的时候提前进行偏移修正。<br>
</font></font><br>
<font style="color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.88)"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">四、</font></font></font><font style="color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.88)"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">刀具路径批量生成</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#000000"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">&nbsp; &nbsp; </font></font><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">1、批量选择</font></font></font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; <img id="aimg_QWTaW" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/Z5qbhQB4/Snipaste-2025-07-07-09-25-23.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/Z5qbhQB4/Snipaste-2025-07-07-09-25-23.png"><br>
<font color="#ff00"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">&nbsp; &nbsp; 注意：根据模版设置的不同颜色，即批量选择与相同深度的生成刀具路径</font></font></font><font style="font-size:16px"><font color="#ff0000">。</font></font><br>
<font style="font-size:16px"><font color="#ff0000"><br>
</font></font><br>
<font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font color="#000"><font style="font-size:16px">&nbsp; &nbsp; 2、刀具路径生成</font></font></font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; <img id="aimg_O9hOz" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/Bvr4HQhn/Snipaste-2025-07-07-09-32-36.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/Bvr4HQhn/Snipaste-2025-07-07-09-32-36.png"><br>
<font size="3"><font color="#ff0000"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont,">&nbsp; &nbsp;</font><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;">注意：例如刻字选择单线雕刻，打孔使用</font></font></font><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont,"><font size="3"><font color="#ff0000">轮廓切割的半径补偿向内，边框使用</font></font></font><font size="3"><font color="#ff0000">轮廓切割的半径补偿向外。</font></font><br>
<font size="3"><font color="#ff0000">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></font><font color="#ff00"><font size="3">请根据材料和雕刻深度，选择分层雕刻的数量。</font></font><br>
<font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font color="#000"><font style="font-size:16px">&nbsp; &nbsp; 3、建议顺序</font></font></font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<img id="aimg_LIS71" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/MKqZ9Hzc/Snipaste-2025-07-07-09-39-13.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/MKqZ9Hzc/Snipaste-2025-07-07-09-39-13.png"><br>
<font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont,">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><font size="3"><font color="#ff0000"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont,"> </font><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;">注意：例如我这个模版，推荐先刻字，然后再打孔，最后才是边框的处理，防止因为边框切割后导致移动而造成废了。</font></font></font><br>
<br>
<font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font color="#000"><font style="font-size:16px">&nbsp; &nbsp; 4、其他问题</font></font></font><br>
<font style="color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.88)"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></font></font><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu34.gif" smilieid="998" border="0" alt="">还没有想好写啥。<br>
<br>
<font style="color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.88)"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">五、</font></font></font><font style="color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.88)"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">NC文件输出与预览</font></font></font><br>
<font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont,"><font style="font-size:16px"><font color="#ba0088">&nbsp; &nbsp; </font><font color="#000000">1、输出</font></font></font><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px"><font color="#000000">NC文件输出。</font></font></font><br>
<font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px"><font color="#000000">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;</font></font></font><img id="aimg_fCxYX" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/kG9CYYPr/Snipaste-2025-07-07-11-07-00.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/kG9CYYPr/Snipaste-2025-07-07-11-07-00.png"><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<img id="aimg_tnnlM" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/2SXzjxhv/Snipaste-2025-07-07-11-07-22.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/2SXzjxhv/Snipaste-2025-07-07-11-07-22.png"><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; <img id="aimg_pT1NW" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/437XYhQ0/Snipaste-2025-07-07-11-09-45.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/437XYhQ0/Snipaste-2025-07-07-11-09-45.png"><br>
<font color="#000000"><font style="font-size:16px">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br>
<font color="#000000"><font style="font-size:16px">&nbsp; &nbsp; </font></font>&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="3"><font color="#ff0000"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont,"> </font><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;">注意：请先运行“</font></font></font><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont,"><font size="3"><font color="#ff0000">NCServer.exe</font></font></font><font style="color:rgb(255, 0, 0)"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font size="3">”软件，才可以将eng转成nc文件</font></font></font><br>
<br>
<font color="#000000"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">&nbsp; &nbsp; 2</font></font><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">、使用软件进行预览，提前查看是否有问题。</font></font></font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<img id="aimg_QgSBp" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/Yqd78xXV/Snipaste-2025-07-07-11-15-50.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/Yqd78xXV/Snipaste-2025-07-07-11-15-50.png"><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="3"><font color="#ff0000"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;">注意：请先运行“</font>NcViewer.exe</font></font><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont,"><font size="3"><font color="#ff0000">”软件，然后打开nc文件</font></font></font><br>
<font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont,"><font size="3"><font color="#ff0000"><br>
</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#000000"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">&nbsp; &nbsp; 3、</font></font><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">使用软件修改文件时间，使切板程序按时间排序，置于第一位。</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#000000"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont,"><font style="font-size:16px">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;</font></font></font><img id="aimg_Res7c" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/VLf1jhFn/Snipaste-2025-07-07-11-31-07.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/VLf1jhFn/Snipaste-2025-07-07-11-31-07.png"><br>
<font size="3"><font color="#ff0000"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 注意：请勿用于非法用途。</font></font></font><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont,"><br>
</font><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font color="#000"><font style="font-size:16px">&nbsp; &nbsp; 4、</font></font></font><font color="#000"><font face="Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16px">课后作业，使用预览软件观看，并分析我所写的切板代码每一行代码的作用，并尝试自己写一个。</font></font></font><br>
<div style="padding:15px 0;"><div style="font-size:12px;">[Asm] <em class="viewsource" style="cursor:pointer;font-size:12px;color:#369 !important;">纯文本查看</em> <em class="copycode" style="cursor:pointer;font-size:12px;color:#369 !important;">复制代码</em></div><pre class="brush: asm; gutter: true">T0 ([锥度平底]JD-20-0.20)
G00X0.000Z2.000
G01Z-0.162F300
X-30.000F800
X600.000F800
X570.000F800
G01Z-0.325F300
X600.000F800

X0.000F800
G01Z-0.487F300
X-30.000F800
X600.000F800
X570.000F800
G01Z-0.650F300
X-30.000F800
X0.000F800
G01Z-0.812F300
X-30.000F800
X600.000F800
X570.000F800
G01Z-0.975F300
X600.000F800
X-30.000F800
X0.000F800
G01Z-1.137F300
X-30.000F800
X600.000F800
X570.000F800
G01Z-1.300F300
X600.000F800
X-30.000F800
G00X500.000Y800.000Z80.000</pre></div><br>
<br>
<br>
&amp;#9888;&amp;#65039; 流程优势总结：<br>
效率提升：MT2CSV-V4 + YmxkDoc 组合方案，自动化实现了 获取.nc 文件的全流程。从提取、排版、输出，将耗时从传统手工复制的“小时级”缩短至“分钟级”，带来一个数量级的效率飞跃！<br>
错误率降低： 顺序输出避免安装错位。<br>
兼容性保障： NC文件头尾代码适配维宏等主流控制系统。<br>
通过上述流程，可实现从设计到NC加工的闭环，大幅提升标牌、浮雕等批量项目的生产效率。实际应用案例显示，该方案可减少约70%的人工干预时间。<br>
